p: The solar cycle has been implicated as a potential factor in the cyclic population dynamics of lynx, snowshoe hare, and other organisms (Klvana et al., 2004; Krebs et al., 2001; Marques, Short, et al., 2014; Selås et al., 2004). Sunspots are a long‐term indicator of total solar irradiance (Krivova et al., 2010), so we obtained the annual sunspot number from the Royal Observatory of Belgium (SILSO World Data Center 2015). We used year as a predictor to investigate trends in recruitment.
